trans-unit.source: Acceptance Testing
Acceptance Tests
Acceptance Tests Demo Repository

Acceptance testing can be performed by a non-technical person. That person can be your tester, manager or even client. If you are developing a web-application (and you probably are) the tester needs nothing more than a web browser to check that your site works correctly. You can reproduce an acceptance tester’s actions in scenarios and run them automatically. Codeception keeps tests clean and simple as if they were recorded from the words of an actual acceptance tester.
trans-unit.target: 验收测试可以由非技术人员执行。该人可以是您的测试人员，经理甚至客户。如果您正在开发Web应用程序（也许正在开发），则测试人员只需要Web浏览器即可检查您的站点是否正常运行。您可以在方案中重现验收测试人员的操作并自动运行它们。Codeception使测试保持干净和简单，就好像是从实际验收测试员的话中记录下来一样。

trans-unit.source: All Together

All actions and assertions that can be performed by the Actor object in a class are defined in modules. It might look like Codeception limits you in testing, but that’s not true. You can extend the testing suite with your own actions and assertions, by writing them into a custom module, called a Helper. We will get back to this later in this chapter, but for now let’s look at the following test:
trans-unit.target: 类中的Actor对象可以执行的所有动作和断言都在模块中定义。看起来Codeception可能会限制您的测试，但事实并非如此。您可以通过将自己的操作和断言写入一个称为“帮助器”的自定义模块中，来扩展测试套件。我们将在本章稍后再回到这一点，但是现在让我们看一下以下测试：

trans-unit.source: All actions and assertions that can be performed by the Tester object in a class are defined in modules. You can extend the testing suite with your own actions and assertions by writing them into a custom module.
trans-unit.target: 所有可以由类中的 Tester 对象执行的动作和断言都在模块中定义。你可以通过将自己的动作和断言写进一个自定义模块来扩展测试套件。

trans-unit.source: As it was mentioned, feature files is not just a user story. By writing features in formal language called Gherkin we can execute those scenarios as automated tests. There is no restrictions in the way how those scenarios are supposed to be tested. Tests can be executed at functional, acceptance, or domain level. However, we will concentrate on acceptance or UI tests in current guide.
trans-unit.target: 如前所述,功能文件不仅仅是一个用户故事。通过用名为Gherkin的形式化语言编写功能,我们可以将这些场景作为自动化测试来执行。在如何测试这些场景的方式上没有限制。测试可以在功能、验收或领域级别执行。然而,在当前的指南中,我们将专注于验收或UI测试。

trans-unit.source: As we can see this simple story highlights core concepts that are called contracts. We should fulfill those contracts to model software correctly. But how we can verify that those contracts are being satisfied? Cucumber introduced a special language for such stories called Gherkin. Same story transformed to Gherkin will look like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们可以看到，这个简单的故事突出了称为合同的核心概念。我们应该履行这些合同以正确地对软件进行建模。但是，我们如何验证这些合同是否得到满足？黄瓜为这种故事引入了一种特殊的语言，叫做小黄瓜。转换为小黄瓜的相同故事将如下所示：

trans-unit.source: As we generated snippets for missing steps with gherkin:snippets command, we will define them in AcceptanceTester file.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 gherkin:snippets 命令生成缺少步骤的代码片段时，我们将在 AcceptanceTester 文件中对其进行定义。

trans-unit.source: As we mentioned earlier, steps should be defined inside context classes. By default all the steps are defined inside an Actor class, for instance, AcceptanceTester. However, you can include more contexts. This can be configured inside global codeception.yml or suite configuration file:
trans-unit.target: 正如我们前面提到的，应该在上下文类中定义步骤。默认情况下，所有步骤都在Actor类（例如 AcceptanceTester )内定义。但是，您可以包括更多上下文。可以在全局 codeception.yml 或套件配置文件中进行配置：

trans-unit.source: As we mentioned, the _failed hook can help in debugging a failed test. You have the opportunity to save the current test’s state and show it to the user, but you are not limited to this.

trans-unit.source: As you see, Cest classes have no parents. This is done intentionally. It allows you to extend your classes with common behaviors and workarounds that may be used in child classes. But don’t forget to make these methods protected so they won’t be executed as tests.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，Cest类没有父母。这是有意完成的。它使您可以使用子类中可能使用的常见行为和变通办法来扩展类。但是不要忘记 protected 这些方法，这样它们就不会作为测试执行。

trans-unit.source: As you see, the syntax is the same for functional and acceptance tests.
trans-unit.target: 如你所见,功能测试和验收测试的语法是一样的。

trans-unit.source: At some point you want to review which parts of your application are tested well and which are not. Just for this case the CodeCoverage is used. When you execute your tests to collect coverage report, you will receive statistics of all classes, methods, and lines triggered by these tests. The ratio between all lines in script and all touched lines is a main coverage criterion. In the ideal world you should get 100% code coverage, but in reality 80% is really enough. Because even 100% code coverage rate doesn’t save you from fatal errors and crashes.
trans-unit.target: 在某些时候，您想查看一下应用程序的哪些部分进行了正确的测试，哪些没有通过测试。仅在这种情况下，使用CodeCoverage。执行测试以收集覆盖率报告时，您将收到由这些测试触发的所有类，方法和行的统计信息。脚本中所有行和所有触摸行之间的比率是主要的覆盖范围标准。在理想情况下，您应该获得100％的代码覆盖率，但实际上80％的覆盖率确实足够。因为即使100％的代码覆盖率也无法使您免于致命的错误和崩溃。

trans-unit.source: BDD

BDD encourages exploration and debate in order to formalize the requirements and the features that needs to be implemented by requesting to write the User Stories in a way that everyone can understand.
trans-unit.target: BDD鼓励探索和辩论,以便将需求和需要实现的功能正式化,要求以大家都能理解的方式编写用户故事。

trans-unit.source: BDD has its own evolution from the days it was born, started by replacing “test” to “should” in unit tests, and moving towards powerful tools like Cucumber and Behat, which made user stories (human readable text) to be executed as an acceptance test.
trans-unit.target: BDD从诞生之日起就有自己的发展，首先是在单元测试中将“测试”替换为“应该”，然后转向诸如Cucumber和Behat之类的强大工具，这些工具使用户故事（人类可读文本）可以作为验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Be warned that fuzzy locators can be significantly slower than strict locators. Especially if you use Selenium WebDriver with wait (aka implicit wait) option. In the example above if you set wait to 5 seconds and use XPath string as fuzzy locator, submitForm method will wait for 5 seconds at each step. That means 5 seconds finding the form by ID, another 5 seconds finding by CSS until it finally tries to find the form by XPath). If speed is a concern, it’s recommended you stick with explicitly specifying the locator type via the array syntax.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，模糊定位器可能比严格定位器慢得多。尤其是如果您将Selenium WebDriver与 wait （也称为隐式等待）选项一起使用。在上面的示例中，如果将 wait 设置为5秒并使用XPath字符串作为模糊定位器，则 submitForm 方法将在每个步骤等待5秒。这意味着5秒钟通过ID查找表单，另外5秒钟通过CSS查找，直到最终尝试通过XPath查找表单为止。如果需要考虑速度，建议您坚持通过数组语法明确指定定位器类型。

trans-unit.source: Before/After Annotations
Behavior Driven Development

Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is a popular software development methodology. BDD is considered an extension of TDD, and is greatly inspired by Agile practices. The primary reason to choose BDD as your development process is to break down communication barriers between business and technical teams. BDD encourages the use of automated testing to verify all documented features of a project from the very beginning. This is why it is common to talk about BDD in the context of test frameworks (like Codeception). The BDD approach, however, is about much more than testing - it is a common language for all team members to use during the development process.
trans-unit.target: 行为驱动开发（BDD）是一种流行的软件开发方法。 BDD被认为是TDD的扩展，并且受到敏捷实践的极大启发。选择BDD作为您的开发过程的主要原因是要打破业务和技术团队之间的沟通障碍。 BDD鼓励从一开始就使用自动化测试来验证项目的所有文档功能。这就是为什么在测试框架（如Codeception）的上下文中经常谈论BDD的原因。但是，BDD方法远不止是测试-它是所有团队成员在开发过程中使用的通用语言。

trans-unit.source: But we don’t want to analyze console output for each failing build. Especially If Jenkins can collect and display the results inside its web UI. Codeception can export its results using JUnit XML format. To generate XML report on each build we will need to append --xml option to Codeception execution command. Codeception will print result.xml file containing information about test status with steps and stack traces for failing tests.

trans-unit.source: By default they throw Incomplete exceptions to ensure test with missing steps won’t be accidentally marked as successful. We will need to implement those steps. As we are in acceptance suite we are probably using PHPBrowser or WebDriver modules. This means that we can use their methods inside Tester file, as we do with writing tests using $I->. You can use amOnPage, click, see methods inside a step definitions, so each Gherkin scenario step to be extended with basic Codeception steps. Let’s show how it can be implemented in our case:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它们会抛出“不完整”异常，以确保不会遗漏将缺少步骤的测试标记为成功。我们将需要执行这些步骤。在接受套件中，我们可能正在使用PHPBrowser或WebDriver模块。这意味着我们可以在Tester文件中使用它们的方法，就像使用 $I-> 编写测试一样。您可以使用 amOnPage ， click ， see 步骤定义中的方法，因此每个Gherkin场景步骤都将通过基本的Codeception步骤进行扩展。让我们展示如何在我们的案例中实现它：

By default, the module will wrap everything into a transaction for each test and roll it back afterwards. By doing this tests will run much faster and will be isolated from each other.

trans-unit.source: By using ORM in functional and integration tests, you can also improve performance of your tests. Instead of cleaning up the database after each test, the ORM module will wrap all the database actions into transactions and roll it back at the end. This way, no actual data will be written to the database. This clean-up strategy is enabled by default, you can disable it by setting cleanup: false in the configuration of any ORM module.
trans-unit.target: 通过在功能测试和集成测试中使用ORM，还可以提高测试性能。ORM模块不会在每次测试后清理数据库，而是将所有数据库操作包装到事务中并在最后回滚。这样，不会将实际数据写入数据库。默认情况下，此清除策略是启用的，您可以通过在任何ORM模块的配置中设置 cleanup: false 来禁用它。

trans-unit.source: Chrome or Firefox
ChromeDriver

ChromeDriver was created by Google to control Chrome and Chromium browsers programmatically. It can be paired with Selenium Server or used as a standalone tool to drive Chrome browser. It is simpler to set up than Selenium Server, however, it has limited support for WebDriver protocol.
trans-unit.target: ChromeDriver由Google创建，用于以编程方式控制Chrome和Chromium浏览器。它可以与Selenium Server配对或用作驱动Chrome浏览器的独立工具。它的设置比Selenium Server更简单，但是，它对WebDriver协议的支持有限。

trans-unit.source: Cloud Testing
Cloud Testing services can run your WebDriver tests in the cloud. In case you want to test a local site or site behind a firewall you should use a tunnel application provided by a service.
trans-unit.target: 云测试服务可以在云端运行您的WebDriver测试。如果您想测试本地站点或防火墙后面的站点,您应该使用服务提供的隧道应用程序。

trans-unit.target: 云测试服务与标准WebDriver协议一起使用。这使得设置云测试非常容易。您只需要将WebDriver配置设置为：

trans-unit.source: Code Coverage
Code inside specify blocks is isolated. In the example above, any changes to $this->user will not be reflected in other code blocks as it is marked with @specify annotation.
trans-unit.target: specify 块内部的代码是隔离的。在上面的示例中，对 $this->user 任何更改都不会反映在其他代码块中，因为它已使用 @specify 注释进行了标记。

trans-unit.source: Code:

CodeCoverage results from remote server will be saved to tests/_output directory. Please note that remote codecoverage results won’t be displayed in console by the reason mentioned above: local and remote results can’t be merged, and console displays results for local codecoverage.
trans-unit.target: 来自远程服务器的CodeCoverage结果将保存到 tests/_output 目录。请注意，由于上述原因，远程代码覆盖结果将不会在控制台中显示：本地和远程结果无法合并，并且控制台将显示本地代码覆盖的结果。

trans-unit.source: Codeception
Codeception Acceptance Tests
Codeception Documentation
Codeception Functional Tests
Codeception Test
Codeception Unit Tests
Codeception allows execution of user stories in Gherkin format in a similar manner as is done in Cucumber or Behat. Please refer to the BDD chapter to learn more.
trans-unit.target: Codeception允许以类似于黄瓜或Behat的方式执行Gherkin格式的用户故事。请参阅BDD章节以了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Codeception allows you to access the properties and methods of all modules defined for this suite. Unlike using the UnitTester class for this purpose, using a module directly grants you access to all public properties of that module.
trans-unit.target: Codeception允许你访问为这个套件定义的所有模块的属性和方法。与使用UnitTester类来实现这一目的不同,使用一个模块直接授权你访问该模块的所有公共属性。

trans-unit.source: Codeception allows you to execute actions in concurrent sessions. The most obvious case for this is testing realtime messaging between users on a site. In order to do it, you will need to launch two browser windows at the same time for the same test. Codeception has a very smart concept for doing this. It is called Friends:
trans-unit.target: 使用Codeception，您可以在并发会话中执行操作。最明显的情况是测试站点上用户之间的实时消息传递。为此，您需要同时启动两个浏览器窗口以进行相同的测试。Codeception有一个非常聪明的概念可以做到这一点。它被称为好友：

trans-unit.source: Codeception allows you to share cookies between tests, so a test user can stay logged in for other tests.
trans-unit.target: Codeception允许你在测试之间共享cookie,这样测试用户就可以在其他测试中保持登录状态。

trans-unit.source: Codeception also assists the developer when dealing with data. Tools for database population and cleaning up are bundled within the Db module. If you use ORM, you can use one of the provided framework modules to operate with database through a data abstraction layer, and use the DataFactory module to generate new records with ease.
trans-unit.target: 代码接收还可以帮助开发人员处理数据。数据库填充和清理工具捆绑在 Db 模块中。如果使用ORM，则可以使用提供的框架模块之一通过数据抽象层与数据库一起操作，并使用DataFactory模块轻松生成新记录。

trans-unit.source: Codeception can connect to different PHP frameworks that support functional testing: Symfony2, Laravel5, Yii2, Zend Framework and others. You just need to enable the desired module in your functional suite configuration to start.
trans-unit.target: Codeception可以连接到不同的PHP框架,支持功能测试。Symfony2,Laravel5,Yii2,Zend Framework等.你只需要在你的功能套件配置中启用所需的模块即可开始。

trans-unit.source: Codeception can generate a PageObject class for you with command:
trans-unit.target: Codeception可以通过命令为你生成一个PageObject类。

trans-unit.source: Codeception can organize tests into groups. Starting from 2.0 it can load information about a group from a files. Sample text file with a list of file names can be treated as a dynamically configured group. Take a look into sample group file:
trans-unit.target: 编码接受可以将测试分组。从2.0开始，它可以从文件中加载有关组的信息。带有文件名列表的示例文本文件可以视为动态配置的组。看一下样本组文件：

trans-unit.source: Codeception comes with bundled extensions located in ext directory. For instance, you can enable the Logger extension to log the test execution with Monolog:
trans-unit.target: Codeception带有位于 ext 目录中的捆绑扩展名。例如，您可以启用Logger扩展以使用Monolog记录测试执行：

trans-unit.source: Codeception does not provide a command like run-parallel. There is no common solution that can play well for everyone. Here are the questions you will need to answer:
trans-unit.target: Codeception不提供类似 run-parallel 的命令。没有通用的解决方案可以让每个人都满意。以下是您需要回答的问题：

trans-unit.source: Codeception does not provide tools for parallel test execution. This is a complex task and solutions may vary depending on a project. We use Robo task runner as an external tool to perform all required steps. To prepare our tests to be executed in parallel we use Codeception features of dynamic groups and environments. To do even more we can create Extensions and Group classes to perform dynamic configuration depending on a test process.
trans-unit.target: Codeception不提供用于并行测试执行的工具。这是一项复杂的任务，解决方案可能会因项目而异。我们使用Robo任务运行程序作为外部工具来执行所有必需的步骤。为了准备并行执行的测试，我们使用动态组和环境的Codeception功能。为了做更多的事情，我们可以创建Extensions和Group类来根据测试过程执行动态配置。

trans-unit.source: Codeception doesn’t restrict you to only the modules from the main repository. Your project might need your own actions added to the test suite. By running the bootstrap command, Codeception generates three dummy modules for you, one for each of the newly created suites. These custom modules are called ‘Helpers’, and they can be found in the tests/_support directory.
trans-unit.target: Codeception不仅将您限制为仅来自主存储库中的模块。您的项目可能需要将自己的操作添加到测试套件中。通过运行 bootstrap 命令，Codeception将为您生成三个虚拟模块，每个新创建的套件一个。这些自定义模块称为“帮助程序”，可以在 tests/_support 目录中找到它们。

trans-unit.source: Codeception follows simple naming rules to make it easy to remember (as well as easy to understand) its method names.
trans-unit.target: Codeception遵循简单的命名规则,使其方法名易于记忆(以及易于理解)。

trans-unit.source: Codeception generates this text representation from PHP code by executing:
trans-unit.target: Codeception通过执行PHP代码来生成这个文本表示。

trans-unit.source: Codeception has a Db module, which takes on most of the tasks of database interaction.
trans-unit.target: Codeception有一个 Db 模块，它承担数据库交互的大部分任务。

trans-unit.source: Codeception has a global configuration in codeception.yml and a config for each suite. We also support .dist configuration files. If you have several developers in a project, put shared settings into codeception.dist.yml and personal settings into codeception.yml. The same goes for suite configs. For example, the unit.suite.yml will be merged with unit.suite.dist.yml.
trans-unit.target: Codeception有一个全局配置 codeception.yml 和每个套件一个配置。我们还支持 .dist 配置文件。如果项目中有多个开发人员，请将共享设置放入 codeception.dist.yml ，将个人设置放入 codeception.yml 。套件配置也是如此。例如， unit.suite.yml 将与 unit.suite.dist.yml 合并。

trans-unit.source: Codeception has built-in installation templates for
Codeception has its own testing format called Cest (Codecept + Test). To start writing a test we need to create a new Cest file. We can do that by running the following command:
trans-unit.target: Codeception有自己的测试格式,叫做Cest(Codecept+Test)。要开始编写测试,我们需要创建一个新的Cest文件。我们可以通过运行以下命令来实现。

trans-unit.source: Codeception has limited capabilities to extend its core features. Extensions are not supposed to override current functionality, but can be useful if you are an experienced developer and you want to hook into the testing flow.
trans-unit.target: Codeception对其核心功能的扩展能力有限。扩展不应该覆盖当前的功能,但如果你是一个有经验的开发人员,并且你想挂入测试流程,那么扩展是有用的。

trans-unit.source: Codeception has many bundled modules which will help you run tests for different purposes and different environments. The idea of modules is to share common actions, so that developers and QA engineers can concentrate on testing and not on reinventing the wheel. Each module provides methods for testing its own part and by combining modules you can get a powerful setup to test an application at all levels.
trans-unit.target: Codeception有很多捆绑的模块,可以帮助你针对不同的目的和不同的环境运行测试。模块的理念是共享共同的操作,这样开发人员和QA工程师就可以专注于测试而不是重新发明轮子。每个模块都提供了测试自己部分的方法,通过组合模块,你可以得到一个强大的设置来测试各个层次的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Codeception has two modules that will help you to test various web services. They need a new api suite to be created. Remember, you are not limited to test only response body. By including Db module you may check if a user has been created after the CreateUser call. You can improve testing scenarios by using REST or SOAP responses in your helper methods.
trans-unit.target: Codeception有两个模块，可以帮助您测试各种Web服务。他们需要创建一个新的 api 套件。请记住，您不仅限于测试响应主体。通过包含 Db 模块，您可以检查在 CreateUser 调用之后是否已创建用户。您可以通过在助手方法中使用REST或SOAP响应来改进测试方案。

trans-unit.source: Codeception is a framework which may look simple at first glance but it allows you to build powerful tests with a single API, refactor them, and write them faster using the interactive console. Codeception tests can be easily organized in groups or Cest classes.
trans-unit.target: Codeception是一个乍一看很简单的框架,但它允许你用一个单一的API构建强大的测试,重构它们,并使用交互式控制台更快地编写它们。Codeception的测试可以很容易地组织成组或Cest类。

trans-unit.source: Codeception is created on top of PHPUnit. If you have experience writing unit tests with PHPUnit you can continue doing so. Codeception has no problem executing standard PHPUnit tests, but, additionally, Codeception provides some well-built tools to make your unit tests simpler and cleaner.
trans-unit.target: Codeception在PHPUnit之上创建。如果您有使用PHPUnit编写单元测试的经验，则可以继续这样做。Codeception在执行标准PHPUnit测试方面没有问题，但是，此外，Codeception提供了一些完善的工具来使您的单元测试更简单，更简洁。

trans-unit.source: Codeception modules can print valuable information while running. Just execute tests with the --debug option to see running details. For any custom output use the codecept_debug function:
trans-unit.target: 代码接收模块可以在运行时打印出有价值的信息。只需使用 --debug 选项执行测试即可查看运行详细信息。对于任何自定义输出，请使用 codecept_debug 函数：

trans-unit.source: Codeception provides Codeception\Stub library for building mocks and stubs for tests. Under the hood it used PHPUnit’s mock builder but with much simplified API.
trans-unit.target: Codeception提供了Codeception \ Stub库，用于构建模拟和测试存根。在后台，它使用了PHPUnit的模拟生成器，但具有简化的API。

trans-unit.source: Codeception reorders tests so dependent tests will always be executed before the tests that rely on them.
trans-unit.target: Codeception重新排序测试,因此依赖性测试总是在依赖它们的测试之前执行。

trans-unit.source: Codeception service will execute command codecept run but only after all services are started. This is defined using depends_on parameter.
trans-unit.target: Codeception服务将执行命令 codecept run ,但仅在所有服务启动之后。这是使用 depends_on 参数定义的。

trans-unit.source: Codeception setup can be customized for the needs of your application. If you build a distributable application and you have a personalized configuration you can build an Installation template which will help your users to start testing on their projects.
trans-unit.target: Codeception的设置可以根据你的应用需求进行定制。如果你建立一个可分发的应用程序,并且你有一个个性化的配置,你可以建立一个安装模板,这将帮助你的用户开始在他们的项目上进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Codeception supports all three testing types. Out of the box you have tools for writing unit, functional, and acceptance tests in a unified framework.
trans-unit.target: Codeception支持所有三种测试类型。开箱即用的工具可以在统一的框架中编写单元测试、功能测试和验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Codeception supports simple dependency injection for Cest and \Codeception\TestCase\Test classes. It means that you can specify which classes you need as parameters of the special _inject() method, and Codeception will automatically create the respective objects and invoke this method, passing all dependencies as arguments. This may be useful when working with Helpers. Here’s an example for Cest:
trans-unit.target: Codeception支持对Cest和\ Codeception \ TestCase \ Test类的简单依赖项注入。这意味着您可以将所需的类指定为特殊 _inject() 方法的参数，然后Codeception将自动创建相应的对象并调用此方法，并将所有依赖项作为参数传递。与助手一起使用时，这可能会很有用。这是Cest的示例：

trans-unit.source: Codeception templates allow creating a customized setup and configuration for your project. An abstract class for installation template. Each init template should extend it and implement a setup method. Use it to build a custom setup class which can be started with codecept init command.
trans-unit.target: Codeception模板允许为您的项目创建自定义的设置和配置。安装模板的抽象类。每个初始化模板都应该对其进行扩展并实现 setup 方法。使用它来构建可通过 codecept init 命令启动的自定义安装类。

trans-unit.source: Codeception tries to locate an element by its text, name, CSS or XPath. You can specify the locator type manually by passing an array as a parameter. We call this a strict locator. Available strict locator types are:
trans-unit.target: Codeception尝试通过其文本，名称，CSS或XPath来定位元素。您可以通过传递数组作为参数来手动指定定位器类型。我们称其为严格的定位器。可用的严格定位器类型为：

trans-unit.source: Codeception uses PHPUnit as a backend for running its tests. Thus, any PHPUnit test can be added to a Codeception test suite and then executed. If you ever wrote a PHPUnit test then do it just as you did before. Codeception adds some nice helpers to simplify common tasks.
trans-unit.target: Codeception 使用 PHPUnit 作为运行测试的后端。因此,任何PHPUnit测试都可以被添加到Codeception测试套件中,然后执行。如果你曾经写过一个PHPUnit测试,那么就像以前那样做。Codeception添加了一些很好的助手来简化常见的任务。

trans-unit.source: Codeception uses modularity to create a comfortable testing environment for every test suite you write.
trans-unit.target: Codeception使用模块化为您编写的每一个测试套件创建一个舒适的测试环境。

trans-unit.source: Codeception uses modularity to create a comfortable testing environment for every test suite you write. Modules allow you to choose the actions and assertions that can be performed in tests.
trans-unit.target: Codeception使用模块化来为你编写的每个测试套件创建一个舒适的测试环境。模块允许你选择可以在测试中执行的动作和断言。

trans-unit.source: Codeception uses this simple and lightweight definitions format which can be easily learned and extended.
trans-unit.target: Codeception使用这种简单轻便的定义格式，可以轻松学习和扩展。

Define all required services in docker-compose.yml file. Make sure to follow Docker philisophy: 1 service = 1 container. So each process should be defined as its own service. Those services can use official Docker images pulled from DockerHub. Directories with code and tests should be mounted using volume directive. And exposed ports should be explicitly set using ports directive.
trans-unit.target: 在 docker-compose.yml 文件中定义所有必需的服务。确保遵循Docker原则：1服务= 1容器。因此，每个进程都应定义为自己的服务。这些服务可以使用从DockerHub提取的官方Docker映像。具有代码和测试的目录应使用 volume 指令安装。并且应该使用 ports 指令显式设置暴露的端口。

trans-unit.source: Description

Despite the wide popularity of TDD (Test Driven Development), some PHP developers never write automated tests for their applications mostly because they think it’s hard, slow or boring. The Codeception framework was developed to actually make testing fun. It allows writing unit, functional, integration, and acceptance tests in a single, coherent style.
trans-unit.target: 尽管TDD（测试驱动开发）的广泛普及，但是一些PHP开发人员从来没有为他们的应用程序编写自动化测试，主要是因为他们认为这是困难，缓慢或无聊的。开发Codeception框架实际上是为了使测试变得有趣。它允许以单一，连贯的样式编写单元测试，功能测试，集成测试和验收测试。

trans-unit.source: Docker

Docker can ship Selenium Server with all its dependencies and browsers inside a single container. Running tests inside Docker is as easy as pulling official selenium image and starting a container with Chrome:
trans-unit.target: Docker可以将Selenium Server及其所有的依赖项和浏览器运送到一个容器中。在Docker内部运行测试就像拉动正式的Selenium映像并使用Chrome启动容器一样容易：

trans-unit.source: Docker works really well for isolating testing environments. By the time of writing this chapter, we didn’t have an awesome tool like it. This chapter demonstrates how to manage parallel execution manually. As you will see we spend too much effort trying to isolate tests which Docker does for free. Today we recommend using Docker for parallel testing.
trans-unit.target: Docker非常适合隔离测试环境。在撰写本章时，我们还没有像它这样的工具。本章演示如何手动管理并行执行。如您所见，我们花了太多精力来尝试隔离Docker免费进行的测试。今天，我们建议使用Docker进行并行测试。

trans-unit.source: Each feature mentioned above may help dramatically when using Codeception to automate the testing of large projects, although some features may require advanced knowledge of PHP. There is no “best practice” or “use cases” when we talk about groups, extensions, or other powerful features of Codeception. If you see you have a problem that can be solved using these extensions, then give them a try.
trans-unit.target: 尽管使用某些功能可能需要PHP的高级知识，但是使用Codeception自动化大型项目的测试时，上述每个功能都可能会极大地帮助您。当我们谈论Codeception的组，扩展或其他强大功能时，没有“最佳实践”或“用例”。如果您发现使用这些扩展名可以解决的问题，请尝试一下。

trans-unit.source: Each feature of a product should be born from a talk between
trans-unit.target: 一个产品的每一个功能都应该是在产品与产品之间的对话中诞生的。

trans-unit.source: Each generated suite have its own configuration inside directory set by paths: tests: configuration option in codeception.yml. Each suite configuration is named like suitename.suite.yml. It allows to enable and configure modules, and more.
trans-unit.target: 每个生成的套件在由 paths: tests: 设置的目录内部都有自己的配置：tests： codeception.yml 中的配置选项。每个套件配置的名称都类似于 suitename.suite.yml 。它允许启用和配置模块等。

trans-unit.source: Each module can handle events from the running test. A module can be executed before the test starts, or after the test is finished. This can be useful for bootstrap/cleanup actions. You can also define special behavior for when the test fails. This may help you in debugging the issue. For example, the PhpBrowser module saves the current webpage to the tests/_output directory when a test fails.
trans-unit.target: 每个模块都可以处理正在运行的测试中的事件。可以在测试开始之前或测试完成之后执行模块。这对于引导/清除操作很有用。您也可以为测试失败定义特殊行为。这可以帮助您调试问题。例如，当测试失败时，PhpBrowser模块会将当前网页保存到 tests/_output 目录。

trans-unit.source: Each module can output internal values that may be useful during debug. For example, the PhpBrowser module prints the response code and current URL every time it moves to a new page. Thus, modules are not black boxes. They are trying to show you what is happening during the test. This makes debugging your tests less painful.
trans-unit.target: 每个模块都可以输出在调试时可能有用的内部值。例如,PhpBrowser模块会在每次移动到新页面时打印响应代码和当前的URL。因此,模块不是黑盒子。它们是想向你展示测试期间发生的事情。这使得你的测试调试不那么痛苦。
